original_text:
because they turned aside from following him
    and had no regard for any of his ways,
korean_text: 그들이 그를 떠나고 그의 모든 길을 깨달아 알지 못함이라

sentences.original_text: because they turned aside from following him
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그를 따르는 길에서 벗어났기 때문에

sentences.original_text: and had no regard for any of his ways,
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그의 어떤 길도 중히 여기지 않았으며,
